name: Snake Adventure: Play Classic Game
description:
Game mode: CLASSIC SNAKE
Eat the food, grow and  survive. Avoid hit your own body and the stone. Beat the map.

Game mode: DOUBLE FOOD
Eat a food and you will be teleported to the other food location. Amazing pixel-art based map with Desert theme.

Want to bring back the feeling of playing classic snake Xenzia game on your Nokia phone? then download and play this free game. With a new design, this game give you a brand new various maps to challenge you. Feeding your snake, think the strategy where to go, and be patient to survive as long as possible and hold the world record.
